goal_descEN: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all

footnotes: [2010-2016]: ["The data correspond to Tourism GVA (direct) as a percentage of total GVA. Data on TSA of Macao is compiled at producers' prices, for the gaming tax (a product tax on gaming) is too enormous to be neglected in estimating indicators such as gross output and gross value added. The TSA of Macao has been compiled since the reference year of 2010."] // [2017]: ["The data correspond to Tourism GVA (direct) as a percentage of total GVA. Provisional value. Data on TSA of Macao is compiled at producers' prices, for the gaming tax (a product tax on gaming) is too enormous to be neglected in estimating indicators such as gross output and gross value added. The TSA of Macao has been compiled since the reference year of 2010"]
sources: Statistics and Census Service (DSEC)

Based on the 2009 TSA, the projections for each year are made using price and physical volume indices. Tourist taxes were levied for the year 2005, with the help of the COU 2005 and it has not been possible to update it to be able to break down the tourist GDP and obtain the GVA. This will be done as the BCU discloses the COU 2012
